plasma: Mkhalidwe wa zinthu wokhala ndi tinthu tating'onoting'ono (ma ion ndi ma electron)
ionic: Mgwirizano wopangidwa ndi kukopa pakati pa ma ions otsutsana
covalent: Mgwirizano wopangidwa ndi kugawana ma electron pakati pa ma atomu
zachitsulo: Mgwirizano wopangidwa ndi kukopa pakati pa ma cations abwino achitsulo ndi ma elekitironi ochotsedwa
balancing equation: Chemical equation yokhala ndi ma atomu ofanana a chinthu chilichonse mbali zonse
mole: Chigawo chomwe chimagwiritsidwa ntchito kuyeza kuchuluka kwa chinthu (chiwerengero cha tinthu tating'ono ta Avogadro)
misa nambala: Chiwerengero cha ma protoni ndi ma neutroni mu nyukiliyasi ya atomu
nambala ya atomiki: Chiwerengero cha ma protoni mu nyukiliyasi ya atomu (amazindikira chinthu)
isotope: Ma atomu a chinthu chomwecho okhala ndi manambala osiyanasiyana a neutroni
okosijeni: Kutayika kwa ma elekitironi kuchokera ku atomu kapena molekyulu
kuchepetsa: Kupeza ma electron ndi atomu kapena molekyulu
redox: Chemical reaction yokhudzana ndi makutidwe ndi okosijeni komanso kuchepetsa njira
activation mphamvu: Mphamvu zochepa zomwe zimafunikira kuti ma chemical reaction achitike
chothandizira: Chinthu chomwe chimawonjezera kuchuluka kwa mankhwala osagwiritsidwa ntchito
thermodynamics: Nthambi ya chemistry yokhudzana ndi kutentha, ntchito, kutentha, ndi mphamvu
endothermic: Chemical reaction yomwe imatenga kutentha kuchokera kumadera ozungulira
exothermic: Chemical reaction yomwe imatulutsa kutentha kumalo ozungulira
